data.text: @GlobalNational So are they going to continue mandating or will it be a choice to wear them?

@EvHanson2 @petermacpei @GlobalNational Who cares! King was nothing more then a fame scab! He was asked several times to stop saying he was an organizer when HE WASN'T! He had nothing to do with any of the meetings or press conferences!

@GlobalNational @CPHO_Canada can fuck ALL the way OFF! MASKS are proven they don't work! All they are is a security blanket for those that still think this is a pandemic!! Ottawa and ALL the other huge protests with 90% NOT wearing masks and NO HUGE rush on the hospitals and "cases"! Proves it!

@GlobalNational Masks should be considered mainly for those of higher risks of death do to age and health but ensure freedom of choice is still optional do to science showing the inadequacy of masks and vaccines that can be lethal or physically damaging!

@GlobalNational @ConsumerSOS “Masks don’t help”. “Masks help”. Wtf are we buying here. She is also Canada’s top doc but she believed what the WHO said was happening, who was being told by China what was happening. I don’t trust our doctors… and I am, or was, pro vax. This is starting to look like a crock!
@GlobalNational Covid BS is over in every other country why are you not reporting that
@GlobalNational Masks are a fundamental layer of obedience.
@GlobalNational If she could show any scientific proof, she might have a tiny bit of credibility,  right now, she has none.
